TopicTitle: should i redo the lego mod

Articles.Content: hi, a long time ago Keptin made the brickmod, which by now is outdated, but it could become so much more. i was wondering if there would be any interest in me redoing and expanding that mod, and also adapting it to plugins, to make it one of the largest mods ksp has seen so far. if anyone is interested in me doing this project, or even wanting to help me make this, just say so.
It'd be cool to see it expand a little. Make sure you get permission first if you're not redoing everything from scratch (or the forum will eat you).

hi, a long time ago Keptin made the brickmod, which by now is outdated, but it could become so much more. i was wondering if there would be any interest in me redoing and expanding that mod, and also adapting it to plugins, to make it one of the largest mods ksp has seen so far. if anyone is interested in me doing this project, or even wanting to help me make this, just say so.
I don't really miss the mod sorry. There are many good lego games out there, I can't say I'd play KSP as a way to play with virtual lego, but all the best of luck.
